Gerindra Usulkan Fachrul Razi Buat Aturan ASN Dilarang Bercadar
07 Nov 2019, 12:03 by Dewi Nurita, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Wakil Ketua Komisi VIII DPR dari Fraksi Gerindra, Muklas Sidik mengusulkan agar Menteri Agama Fachrul Razi tegas saja mengeluarkan aturan yang melarang aparatur sipil negara (ASN) mengenakan cadar dan celana cingkrang.
Muklas mengatakan hal itu untuk menghindari salah tafsir bahwa Fachrul melarang masyarakat umum mengenakan cadar. Padahal, Fachrul hanya meminta ASN mematuhi aturan untuk mengenakan seragam sesuai aturan masing-masing institusi.
"Padahal berpakaian itu kan ada maqomnya. Maka, bapak tidak usah ragu-ragu kalau mau membuat kebijakan. Kalau ke kantor enggak boleh pakai cadar dan celana cingkrang, selesai. Kalau enggak, ya, jangan jadi ASN dong," ujar Muklas di Kompleks Parlemen, Senayan, Jakarta, pada Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Terkait usulan itu, Fachrul mengatakan bahwa setiap institusi telah memiliki aturan masing-masing. "Saya kira, kalau aturan kepegawaian, sudah semestinya dipatuhi oleh seluruh aparatur, termasuk soal seragam. Nah, ini yang diwacanakan akan diterbitkan,‚Äù ujar Fachrul di lokasi yang sama.
Fachrul menyatakan bahwa dirinya tidak pernah melarang orang-orang memakai cadar dan celana cingkrang dalam kehidupan bermasyarakat. Bahkan, ujar Fachrul, dirinya juga kerap memakai cingkrang saat ke masjid.
Dalam kehidupan sehari-hari, ujar Fachrul, semua orang bebas berpakaian. Namun, ujar dia, ASN tentu memiliki aturan yang berbeda sesuai dengan ketentuan institusi masing-masing. "Jadi, mohon itu digarisbawahi, saya tidak pernah melarang. Apa juga kewenangan saya melarang itu?," ujar Fachrul Razi.
Terkait cadar, ujar Fachrul, juga sama halnya. "Silakan pakai, saya tidak pernah melarang. Tapi, bagaimana keputusan instansi, itu urusan masing-masing," ujar Fachrul.

Gerindra Proposes Fachrul Razi To Make ASN Rules No Veil
Nov 7 2019, 12:03 by Dewi Nurita, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Deputy Chairperson of the House of Representatives Commission VIII from the Gerindra Faction, Muklas Sidik, proposed that the Minister of Religion Fachrul Razi firmly issue a regulation prohibiting the state civil apparatus (ASN) from wearing veils and trousers.
Muklas said that to avoid misinterpretation that Fachrul forbade the general public from wearing the veil. In fact, Fachrul only asked ASN to obey the rules to wear uniforms according to the rules of each institution.
"Even though there is maqom, there is a maqom. So, you don't need to hesitate if you want to make a policy. If you go to the office, you can't wear a veil and short pants, it's finished. If you don't, yes, don't become ASN," Muklas said in the Parliament Complex. , Senayan, Jakarta, on Thursday, November 7, 2019.
Regarding the proposal, Fachrul said that each institution has its own rules. "I think, if the staffing rules, all apparatus should be obeyed, including the matter of uniforms. Well, this is what will be published," said Fachrul in the same location.
Fachrul stated that he had never forbidden people from wearing veils and trousers in social life. In fact, said Fachrul, he also often uses cingkrang when he goes to the mosque.
In everyday life, said Fachrul, everyone is free to dress. However, he said, ASN certainly has different rules according to the provisions of each institution. "So, please underline, I have never banned it. What is my authority to prohibit it ?," said Fachrul Razi.
Regarding the veil, said Fachrul, it is also the same. "Please use it, I have never banned it. But, what is the agency's decision, it's their own business," said Fachrul.
